title: Someone Irresistible
description: In her Avon debut, set in London in the 1850s, Adele Ashworth delivers a deeply emotional, highly sensual love story between a hero determined to restore his tarnished reputation and the one woman who, though torn by loyalties, can possibly help him. Adele writes the kind of romance that you can sink your teeth into â€” it's fast, furious, and unforgettable.
author: Adele Ashworth
